items.sentence: I\'d really like to know why Tom didn\'t do what we asked him to do.
I\'m beginning to think that there\'s nothing we can do to help Tom.
Mary and her boyfriend are planning to go to a movie Friday evening.
Tom said that he didn\'t believe that Mary would do that by herself.
The bread that I bought at the supermarket doesn\'t taste very good.
The first step in solving a problem is realizing there\'s a problem.
We sat around the campfire, roasting marshmallows and singing songs.
Do you want to come over to my place and watch a movie or something?
Tom doesn\'t think there is any need for Mary to attend the meeting.
Our house was broken into last week, but it seems nothing was taken.
